CHAT.comment: HE and CO are playing in the upstairs playhouse; CO is in the corner with the doll's beds; HE is standing nearby , playing on the phone

u.a: hangs up phone; HE approaches CO
HE turns to look out on rest of room; goes to the fence
HE watches other children for several minutes; one parent waves at HE; HE waves back; CO picks up phone
CO hangs up phone
HE is "mom"; HE continues to look out
HE turns around
makes another call , maybe to police
girls look out , as if one of the children downstairs is now "the bad guy"; HE goes to fence to look out
HE runs back from fence , fixes tablecloth
both go to the stairs
screams
screams; HE and CO go downstairs 1-minutes; screaming , adult intervenes; HE and CO go back upstairs
referring to something on doll
pulls back the bed covers
HE makes slurping noises at the stove
HE comes back to bed and puts doll in
baby voice
baby voice
baby voice
CO gets up and starts to head downstairs; HE gets up and follows her quickly and stops her
HE starts to go downstairs
shouts
HE comes back upstairs; CO and HE go to the doll's beds again
gets up
whispers like talking to doll; CO stands at table for a while
doll talking
doll talking
whispers
CO returns to the beds
laughs
sing-song , then laughs; all quiet <minutes> CO in bed
HE goes to bed downstairs , quiet for awhile; HE then gets interested in activity tables , plays there for a while , then HE returns upstairs
frantic "warning"
runs around table; frantic
CO gets out of bed , both go downstairs; they go outside for a bit; then they return
HE and CO start to go upstairs
HE , CO , and LI upstairs; LI finds shoes; HE plays at stove
CO sits down; LI puts shoes on CO; LI then leaves; HE and CO go downstairs
